channel.title: Fixing slayer on a matrix source. and makeover mage
channel.description: ive tried everything, and nothing fixes it. does anyone know how to fix it. if so add my skype or message me here with the fix. also i heard that matrix has the makeover mage already in. so does anyone have the interface id to open that? and where does it go in a 667?

item.title: Fixing slayer on a matrix source. and makeover mage
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

im sure u didnt try everything

if u DID you would have payed jagex a fuckton and ripped slayer from their sourcecode.

But you didn’t.

Besides, i doubt slayer would be hard to do…
whats wrong with it?

Read full topic
